column1: Little Goat Diner////Quite a busy spot on Sundays
column2: after a short wait was seated at the bar. As someone with a food allergy
column3: I was impressed by their "dairy free" specific menu
column4: which I have never seen at any other restaurant. I ordered a pork belly pancake that was delicious and reasonably priced. My girlfriend ordered fried chicken waffles and she was also impressed. Would highly recommend if you are visiting Chicago
